net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_removeDamage
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Remove damage from a token with these parameters in JSON: { "id": Id of the token taking damage, "current": Token's current hit points, "temporary": Token's temporary hit points "damage": The amount of damage taken by the token } These token properties must be set: MaxHP, DSPass, DSFail The Exhaustion 6 state should also be set. After applying the damage this macro calls dnd5e_applyHealth
